David Moyes Mengenang Momen Saat 'Dijebak' Sir Alex untuk Latih Manchester United
06 Nov 2019, 02:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ternyata, David Moyes mendapatkan jabatan pelatih di Manchester United dengan cara yang cukup menjebak. Ia berkata bahwa mantan pelatih the Red Devils, Sir Alex Ferguson, tidak memberinya pilihan.
Seperti yang diketahui, Moyes pernah menukangi Manchester United selepas Sir Alex memutuskan pensiun di tahun 2013. Sebelumnya ia adalah pelatih Everton dan cukup berjasa membawa nama klub asal Merseyside tersebut semakin terdengar.
Sayang, kiprahnya di Old Trafford tidak berjalan dengan manis. Moyes dipecat dipecat pada bulan April 2014 karena dianggap sebagai biang kerok penurunan performa Manchester United. Saat itu, The Red Devils sedang bertengger di peringkat tujuh klasemen Premier League.
Karirnya setelah menukangi Manchester United pun tak membaik. Ia pernah menukangi tiga klub yang berbeda, seperti Real Sociedad, Sunderland, dan terakhir West Ham United. Namun dirinya hanya mampu bertahan selama satu musim saja.

David Moyes Recalls the Moment When Sir Alex was 'Trapped' to Train Manchester United
Nov 6 2019, 02:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Apparently, David Moyes got the post of coach at Manchester United in a way that was quite entrapping. He said that the former Red Devils coach, Sir Alex Ferguson, did not give him a choice.
As is known, Moyes once coached Manchester United after Sir Alex decided to retire in 2013. Previously he was the coach of Everton and quite credited with bringing the name of the Merseyside club increasingly heard.
Unfortunately, his work at Old Trafford did not run sweetly. Moyes was fired in April 2014 because he was considered to be the culprit of Manchester United's declining performance. At that time, the Red Devils were perched at number seven in the Premier League standings.
His career after managing Manchester United did not improve. He has coached three different clubs, such as Real Sociedad, Sunderland, and finally West Ham United. But he was only able to survive for one season.
